summary: This header file defines platform-specific configuration macros for the NeXT operating system within the sendmail application. It sets various feature flags indicating lack of support for certain features on NeXT and defines platform identification.

logs.reason: Identifies the platform as NeXT when printed in logs. This may appear in system logs when platform-specific behavior is being reported.
logs.resolution: This is informational only and doesn't indicate an error. If seeing this in logs, it confirms the code is running on a NeXT platform.
